item.title: Valley Markets Music
item.description:
Sunday, June 9, 2013, 11am – 2pm

At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Drew Wilson. At the end of 2011, Drew was awarded a $10,000 ARTS QLD Grant to record a new album and won the APG Powerstage Competition and another $10,000 in prize money. This has funded his 3rd release, the 13 track Album "Carousel". The album was recorded in an un-leased shopfront on the Sunshine Coast as a fishbowl project where the public could walk past and watch the recording in progress.

Cost: Free
Venue: Brunswick Street Mall
Venue address: Brunswick Street Mall, Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley
item.xCal:description: At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Drew Wilson. At the end of 2011, Drew was awarded a $10,000 ARTS QLD Grant to record a new album and won the APG Powerstage Competition and another $10,000 in prize money. This has funded his 3rd release, the 13 track Album "Carousel". The album was recorded in an un-leased shopfront on the Sunshine Coast as a fishbowl project where the public could walk past and watch the recording in progress.

item.title: Valley Markets Music
item.description:
Saturday, June 15, 2013, 11am – 2pm

At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Saturday is Pat Tierney. Brisbane based Pat Tierney is getting set to release his second EP with the first single 'Take on the world' released on New Year's Day 2012. Pat played over fifty shows in 2011, including the annual 2High Festival at Brisbane's Powerhouse and a headline slot at Currumbin's Soundlounge. His latest offering is the follow up to his debut EP 'Friends & Lovers.' His sound continues to develop with his slide guitar in hand and a unique mix of folk, blues & reggae.

Cost: Free
Venue: Brunswick Street Mall
Venue address: Brunswick Street Mall, Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley
item.xCal:description: At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Saturday is Pat Tierney. Brisbane based Pat Tierney is getting set to release his second EP with the first single 'Take on the world' released on New Year's Day 2012. Pat played over fifty shows in 2011, including the annual 2High Festival at Brisbane's Powerhouse and a headline slot at Currumbin's Soundlounge. His latest offering is the follow up to his debut EP 'Friends & Lovers.' His sound continues to develop with his slide guitar in hand and a unique mix of folk, blues & reggae.

item.title: Valley Markets Music
item.description:
Sunday, June 16, 2013, 11am – 2pm

At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Felicity Lawless. As a major songwriter for Anarchist Duck and Bertha Control, Flawless perhaps is better known for her funk, reggae and rhymes. Stripped from her bands, she sings a new breed of reggaefunk with flamenco elements. Her songs tell the tales of her adventures through a number of lifetimes.

Cost: Free
Venue: Brunswick Street Mall
Venue address: Brunswick Street Mall, Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley
item.xCal:description: At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Felicity Lawless. As a major songwriter for Anarchist Duck and Bertha Control, Flawless perhaps is better known for her funk, reggae and rhymes. Stripped from her bands, she sings a new breed of reggaefunk with flamenco elements. Her songs tell the tales of her adventures through a number of lifetimes.

item.title: Valley Markets Music
item.description:
Saturday, June 22, 2013, 11am – 2pm

At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Saturday is Hannah Rosa. Hannah Rosa has potent combination of catchy melodies and warm stage presence. Frequently compared to artists such as Gabrielle Aplin, Missy Higgins and Julia Stone, Hannah’s songs have been described as “beautifully crafted, honest and personal” (Roselon, AAA Backstage 2011). Her debut EP, featuring YouTube hit (original song “You Chose Me”), is due for release mid 2013.

Cost: Free
Venue: Brunswick Street Mall
Venue address: Brunswick Street Mall, Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley
item.xCal:description: At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Saturday is Hannah Rosa. Hannah Rosa has potent combination of catchy melodies and warm stage presence. Frequently compared to artists such as Gabrielle Aplin, Missy Higgins and Julia Stone, Hannah’s songs have been described as “beautifully crafted, honest and personal” (Roselon, AAA Backstage 2011). Her debut EP, featuring YouTube hit (original song “You Chose Me”), is due for release mid 2013.

item.title: Valley Markets Music
item.description:
Sunday, June 23, 2013, 11am – 2pm

At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Lauren Lucille. Lauren’s songwriting started at the age of ten and, through her teens, Lauren was writing folk and pop songs on guitar and piano. Performing at festivals and venues around Australia for the past 6 years, Lauren is now acknowledged by her peers as a great composer and performer and was a finalist in the 2012 QMusic Awards for one of her jazz compositions from her new and well received all-originals album 'Hidden Here'.

Cost: Free
Venue: Brunswick Street Mall
Venue address: Brunswick Street Mall, Brunswick St, Fortitude Valley
item.xCal:description: At the Valley Markets each weekend there will be live entertainment at the Brunswick Street Mall Stage showcasing some of Brisbane's upcoming artists. This Sunday is Lauren Lucille. Lauren’s songwriting started at the age of ten and, through her teens, Lauren was writing folk and pop songs on guitar and piano. Performing at festivals and venues around Australia for the past 6 years, Lauren is now acknowledged by her peers as a great composer and performer and was a finalist in the 2012 QMusic Awards for one of her jazz compositions from her new and well received all-originals album 'Hidden Here'.
